name: teia escapism #32
description:
"An Escape from Reality"

escapism: whimsical and fantastical collection of surrealist 3D artwork environments. 
designed to transport the viewer to an alternate reality.
the collection was born from a need for escapism and a strong desire for creative freedom.

escapism is mental diversion from unpleasant or boring aspects of daily life, typically through activities involving imagination or entertainment.
escapism may be used to occupy one's self away from persistent feelings of depression or general sadness. 

virtual reality offers a form of escapism
